name: MAKE A MERRY TRY AGAIN
description: If loading a page fails, try again after x seconds. The reload bypasses the browser cache. This add-on was inspired by the sadly discontinued add-on TryAgain, but is in no way affiliated to it or its authors. Feel free to view and change the source code on: https://github.com/ryhaberecht/MAKE-A-MERRY-TRY-AGAIN
